verses.roman:
nṛtyera mādhurī kebā varṇibāre pāre
mahāprabhu āise yei nṛtya dekhibāre

synonyms: nṛtyera mādhurī—the sweetness of the dancing; kebā—who; varṇibāre pāre—can describe; mahāprabhu āise—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu comes; yei—that; nṛtya—dancing; dekhibāre—to see.
translation: No one can properly describe the sweetness of Lord Nityānanda's dancing. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu personally comes to see it.
